revised_title: Anatomical Observations and Experiments on Bones and Bone Formation
tldr: The author, Clopton Havers, provides detailed observations and experiments on the structure, function, and formation of bones, as well as the role of glands in nutrition and secretion. He discusses the membrane surrounding bones, the composition and structure of bones, the role of blood vessels in nourishing bones, and the process of bone accretion and nutrition. Additionally, Havers explores the structure and function of teeth, the role of marrow, and the treatment of bone-related diseases such as rickets and venereal nodes.
